pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, February 6, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Saturday, February 6, 2016:

Québec City

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the funeral for Suzanne Bernier. He will be joined by Jean-Yves Duclos, Minister of Families, Children and Social Development and MP for Québec and Joël Lightbound, MP for Louis-Hébert.

Closed to media.

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the joint funeral for Yves Carrier, Gladys Chamberland, Maude Carrier, Charles-Élie Carrier and Louis Chabot.  He will be joined by Jean-Yves Duclos, Minister of Families, Children and Social Development and MP for Québec and Joël Lightbound, MP for Louis-Hébert.

Closed to media.

Toronto

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the 27th Annual Dragon Ball Gala in celebration of the Chinese New Year.

Metro Toronto Convention Centre
Lower Floor
255 Front Street West
Toronto, ON

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 5:00 p.m.

PMO Media Relations: 613-957-5555
